title: tours in LA office
body: so if i am registering for a tour and i am under 18, what ID should i put if i don't have one that is government issued? Should i write my parents name in the first and last name section and my parents id in the photo? or should i write my name and put my parents ID?

replies.body: I couldn't say for sure, so I wouldn't want to give you inaccurate information.  Reach out to our tour guides via riothqtours@riotgames.com with your question.  They'll help clear things up!
